text: Arau tumi yetiya sihamtara prati laksya karaiba tetiya sihamtara dehara akrti tomaka mugdha karaiba arau sihamte yetiya katha kaya tumi sihamtara katha agraherae suni thaka. Sihamta berata laga'i thoraa kathara khutara darae; sihamte yikono sabdaka nijara biraud'dhe dharana karae. Sihamte'i satrau, eteke sihamtara bisaye satarka horaa; allahe sihamtaka dhbansa karaka!
